org.anarres.qemu.exec

Class QEmuDriveOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.qemu.exec.AbstractQEmuOption
      • org.anarres.qemu.exec.QEmuDriveOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QEmuOption

    public class QEmuDriveOption
extends AbstractQEmuOption
    A disk device backend, usually paired with a QEmuDeviceOption frontend.
    See Also:
    QEmuVirtioDriveRecipe, QEmuDeviceOption
